amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to lease or purchase new light duty vehicle for any executive fleet, or for an agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum - Federal Fleet Performance, dated May 24, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Engel.
